name: Enhance Product Photos on Shopify with Picsartâ€™s Background Remover
description:
Each time you add a new product to your Shopify store, Make will seamlessly utilize Picsart to remove the background from the primary image, replacing it with a crisp white backdrop. Following this, the product listing is instantly updated with the enhanced image.

This template was created by Picsart and not tested by Make. For any inquiries about the template, please reach out to the template creator: apidevsupport@picsart.com.
